statement.p: A communications tower is located at the top of a steep hill, as shown. The angle of inclination of the hill is 71째. A guy wire is to be attached to the top of the tower and to the ground, 122 yd downhill from the base of the tower. The angle formed by the guy wire is 16째. Find the length of the cable required for the guy wire.
